## Update dependencies
```kts
implementation("dev.rollczi:{artifact}:{version}")
```
```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>dev.rollczi</groupId>
    <artifactId>{artifact}</artifactId>
    <version>{version}</version>
</dependency>
```
⚠️ Replace `{artifact}` with [platform artifact](https://docs.rollczi.dev/documentation/litecommands/platforms.html)
